Another thing you need to take backis your accusation that I bashed Romney for being a Mormon; the post you refered to was posted by someone else and my connection to that post was to tell that poster not to write anti-mormon stuff as mormons (except Mitt and Dingy) are good people as I have said in all my posts.
I know the Romney Camp are a bunch of alinskis so I am very careful not to let them get that to be the story like they did against Huckabee;
There is plenty of low-hanging fruit to throw at Romney growing on trees he planted himself, and I want to keep the focus there.
I did make a joke about Ann Coulter, and I said Romney could be caught comiting an abortion himself and Coulter said well at least he did it privately and not with federal money so its a states rights issue ....or something like that, the joke being about Romney supporters backing him no matter what is found out which at a certain point makes you wonder what they are fighting FOR
And also I was thinking of using the traditional "picture with a goat or small child" line, but decided to avoid confusing by using abortion instead because everyone would know that was a joke as well and Mitt has a pro-abortion track record.
It is telling that you were horrified at the idea of Mitt comiting an abortion himself, but Acted like his pro-abortion record is somehow so removed from aborting babies, when the real difference is that Pro-abortion people who don't kill the baby themselves but have funded it themselves, and mandate funding for it just didn't get their hands dirty visibly, but their hands have a "damn Spot" on them ("out out Damn Spot")
